Name: Crystal Path
About the game: The dwellers of the fairy land are happy to greet you in their beautiful country where they've prepared challenging puzzles that await you. Travel through the mysterious paths covered with crystals in many shapes and colors, and if you can remove all the crystals, the 'creature' will let you go further. This game is packed with bonuses that make for an unforgettable, magical experience each time you tread the mysterious paths of this exciting puzzle land.
